content.rendered:
Compliance

Import Licence Singapore

  1. Home

Ensuring Compliance Excellence

TrueLog upholds the highest quality, environmental, and health and safety standards, ensuring excellence in customs compliance and service.

Qualified Experts

Whether you are OEM, ISP, IT distributor, IT reseller, system integrator or managed service provider, Truelog can help you deploy your equipment across the globe.

EOR/IOR

Exporter/Importer of Record (EOR/IOR), Truelog has been provided with professional IOR services for IT equipment, and technology hardware and goods in over 80 countries worldwide.

Declaring Agent

Truelog is certified by Singapore customs as declaring agents. Unlike many freight forwarders, we keep this important value add service in-house.

US/Canada-FIOR

We are registered FIOR in the USA and Canada, ensuring compliance with industry standards, regulations, and laws in both countries.

EU – EORI

Truelog is registered as FIOR/EORI in EU to deliver your goods to all 28 countries of the European Union.

Global Network

With an excellent network of operators who are available 24 hours a day and seven days a week, we promise on timely and cost-effective delivery of goods to the desired destination.

Customs Brokerage

As a licensed customs agent, Truelog provides timely clearance services and handles shipments for exhibitions, tradeshows, fairs, equipment for testing purposes, and any temporary cargoes without the need for you to have an entity in Singapore.

Cross Trade

Truelog is able to meet your demand for overseas freight forwarding and can arrange to ship your goods from anywhere in the world to your required final destination.
Learn more

TrueLog – Specialists in Customs & Compliance

At TrueLog, we are dedicated to being a premier provider of customs services and cutting-edge technology. Our unwavering commitment to quality and compliance is evident in the meticulous standards we uphold through our internal quality initiatives. Delivering exceptional customs solutions requires continuous dedication to quality, regulatory adherence, and customer satisfaction.

How TrueLog Ensures Quality in Customs Clearance

Real-Time Regulatory Updates

We employ sophisticated monitoring systems that provide our clients with real-time updates on regulatory changes, ensuring they remain compliant and well-prepared for any new customs requirements.

Tailored Internal Quality Program

Our internal quality program is uniquely tailored to our operations, allowing us to consistently monitor and improve the quality of our services and technology solutions. Regular assessments and stringent benchmarks help us meet and exceed client expectations

Innovative Technology Solutions

TrueLog uses advanced customs declaration applications designed to streamline the customs process, enhance accuracy, and maintain compliance with dynamic regulatory environments.

Benefits for TrueLog Clients

At TrueLog, quality and compliance are at the core of everything we do. By leveraging real-time regulatory updates, a tailored internal quality program, and innovative technology solutions, we ensure our clients receive superior customs services. Partner with us to confidently navigate the complexities of international trade and achieve excellence in your operations.

Customized Client Solutions

We focus on understanding the specific needs of each client and tailor our services accordingly. This client-centric approach ensures seamless customs clearance and more efficient logistics operations.

Ongoing Enhancement and Adaptation

TrueLog is committed to continuous improvement. We regularly review our processes through audits, performance evaluations, and client feedback, enabling us to adapt and enhance our services in response to the evolving global trade landscape.

Comprehensive Support and Transparency

Our clients benefit from full transparency and dedicated support. We provide detailed status reports and maintain open communication channels, ensuring clients are always informed. Dedicated account managers offer personalized assistance to address specific needs promptly.
